fullplot: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live in Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust. They befriend Stingo, the movie's narrator, a young American writer new to New York City. But the happiness of Sophie and Nathan is endangered by her ghosts and his obsessions.
plot: A mother has to make a very difficult decision.
title: Sophie's Choice
writers: William Styron (based on the novel: "Sophie's Choice" by)
